title: Convex lens - rays 1 and 2 cross principal axis

content.question: Two rays are incident on a convex lens, as shown in the figure. Both rays are initially parallel to the principal axis of the lens. Ray <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> then crosses the principal axis at point <math alttext="P sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, which is a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> from the lens. If Ray <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> is initially twice as far from the principal axis as Ray <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, how far from the lens is point <math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, the location where Ray <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> crosses the principal axis?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is a distance <math alttext="d over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> from the lens.

<math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> from the lens.

<math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is a distance <math alttext="2 d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi></math> from the lens.

<math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is greater than a distance of <math alttext="2 d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>d</mi></math> from the lens.

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> is a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math> from the lens.
